import React from 'react'; import './styles/style.css'; class MyForm extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { name: '', surname: '', country: '', birthday: '' }; this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this); } handleChange(event){ this.setState({[event.target.name]: event.target.value}); } render(){ return( //

Hello {this.state.name} {this.state.surname} from {this.state.country}

Name Country Birthday
Pedro Zenha Portugal 11/12/1996
InÃªs Mota Mexedo 19/03/1997
); } } export default MyForm;
